**Wikipedia summary**:  
<p class="mw-empty-elt">
</p>

<p><i><b>Sebastes</b></i> is a genus of marine ray-finned fish belonging to the subfamily Sebastinae part of the family Scorpaenidae, most of which have the common name of <b>rockfish</b>. A few are called ocean perch, <b>sea perch</b> or <b>redfish</b> instead. They are found in the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans.
